content: this is a pdf file and not the finished amigurumi animal in the photos create your own bee using my amigurumi bee shofi pdf you can create gift toys by yourself and surprise your children family or colleagues amigurumi pattern includes description body head arms wings tendrils languages pdf crochet pattern is written on english us terms level of difficulty beginner the pdf crochet animal patterns requires basic knowledge of crocheting size 12 cm ~4 7 inch if using similar materials i used a yarn that s cotton 55% acrylic 45% 50g/160 mt yarnart jeans cotton 55% acrylic 45% 100g/330 mt alize cotton gold 2 25 mm crochet hook if you have any questions about the pattern write to me i will be happy to help you i d love to see your finished bee really ♥ © anna fores all rights reserved
